content:
ITEM NO.29               COURT NO.11               SECTION XVII-A
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
Miscellaneous Application No.  927/2025 in C.A. No. 8076/2024
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated  29-07-2024
in C.A. No.8076/2024 passed by the Supreme Court of India]
HARYANA SHAHARI VIKAS PRADHIKARAN (HSVP)
[FORMERLY KNOWN AS HARYANA URBAN DEVELOPMENT 
AUTHORITY (HUDA) & ANR.   Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
HOSHIYAR SIINGH                                    Respondent(s)
IA No. 69685/2025 - APPROPRIATE ORDERS/DIRECTIONS
 
Date : 07-07-2025 This matter was called on for hearing today.
CORAM : 
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE SUDHANSHU DHULIA
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE JOYMALYA BAGCHI
    (PARTIAL COURT WORKING DAYS BENCH) 
For Parties     :Mr. Naveen Sharma, AOR
                   Mr. Shreeyash Uday Lalit, Adv.
                   Mrs. Swati Bhushan Sharma, Adv.
                   Mr. S.k. Sharma, Adv.
                   Mr. Anurag Parashar, Adv.
                   Mr. Samaksh Sharma, Adv.
                   Mr. Hasan Abbas, Adv.
                   
                   Mr. Akshay Amritanshu , AOR
                   Mr. Sanjay Kumar Visen, AOR
                   
For Respondent(s) : Mr. Lokesh Sinhal,Sr. AAG
Mr. Samar Vijay Singh, AOR
Ms. Ishika Gupta, Adv.
Ms. Sabarni Som, Adv.
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
Miscellaneous Application No.  927/2025  
Issue notice returnable on 23.07.2025.
Mr. Samar Vijay Singh, learned counsel accepts notice 
accept on behalf of the non-applicant(s)/appellant(s).
 
(NEETU SACHDEVA)                                (RENU BALA GAMBHIR)
ASTT. REGISTRAR-cum-PS                        ASSISTANT  REGISTRAR
